statements: SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_metrics;
SELECT team_name, performance_metrics FROM team_metrics ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_metrics WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_id, team_name, data_trends->'revenue' AS revenue FROM team_metrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT team_name, performance_metrics->'efficiency' AS efficiency FROM team_metrics WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_metrics ORDER BY team_name DESC, team_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, jsonb_typeof(data_trends) AS data_trends_type FROM team_metrics WHERE team_id > 5 ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, jsonb_array_length(performance_metrics->'metrics') AS num_metrics FROM team_metrics WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM team_metrics WHERE jsonb_typeof(data_trends) = 'array' GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT team_id, team_name, jsonb_pretty(data_trends) AS formatted_data_trends FROM team_metrics WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY team_id;
SELECT * FROM team_data;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_data ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM team_data WHERE team_location='New York';
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM team_data WHERE team_location='Chicago' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM team_data WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_data WHERE team_location = 'New York';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_name, team_location, metric_value FROM team_data JOIN performance_metrics ON team_data.team_id = performance_metrics.team_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS metric_count FROM team_data JOIN performance_metrics ON team_data.team_id = performance_metrics.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT trend_name, description FROM DataTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataTrends WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT name, role FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value, timestamp FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM DataTrends WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT member_id, name, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE location IN ('New York', 'San Francisco') ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM teams WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_date FROM data_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_result FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT insight_description FROM insights;
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC, team_size ASC
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM teams WHERE team_size > 5
SELECT * FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM performance_metrics
SELECT insight_description FROM insights
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to=101 ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT analysis_name, insights FROM data_analysis WHERE metric_id IN (SELECT metric_id FROM performance_metrics WHERE quality_score > 80);
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 3 AND assigned_to = 2 ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT analysis_name, insights FROM data_analysis WHERE project_id = 5 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
